duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct pre-trip and post-trip vehicle inspections.
Deliver and/or pick up freight to/from customer locations and/or a terminal as instructed.
Ensure all shipping documentation is available for inspection and appropriate paperwork accompanies the shipment.
Load and/or unload a wide variety of freight onto and off a company motor vehicle, at customer locations and at the terminal.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class D license, At least 21 years of age, No DUI’s or DWI’s (in the past 3 years), No more than 3 traffic violations (in past 3 years)
